description: This file defines and configures two AI agents with associated tools and a playground environment for testing and interaction, including setting up storage, models, and serving the application.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with a specific model, tools, and configuration.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: Represents the Claude language model from Anthropic.

classes.name: Playground
classes.description: Provides an environment for testing and interacting with AI agents.

classes.name: SqliteAgentStorage
classes.description: Handles storage of agent sessions in a SQLite database.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: Tools for querying DuckDuckGo search engine.

classes.name: ThinkingTools
classes.description: Tools for reasoning and thinking tasks.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: Tools for financial data retrieval from Yahoo Finance.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Retrieves the web application instance from the Playground.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Runs the web server to serve the application.
